synopsis.text:
Association(WNA), with the aim of preserving their ancestral skills and fostering a new generation of shinobi. The WNA's groundbreaking invention, Ninja-Gum, enables modern ninjas to summon formidable weapons on the fly, setting the stage for thrilling battles. To determine the most powerful shinobi, the Ninjala Tournament is established, drawing in talented competitors such as Berecca and Burton, students of the WNA Academy.

Meanwhile, young Van, a basketball enthusiast, finds himself unexpectedly thrust into this hidden world when he witnesses his father being attacked by ninjas. As he navigates through the complexities of this new reality, he uncovers conspiracies involving Ninja-Gum and mysterious entities lurking in the shadows. In this fast-paced, action-packed anime set in 20XX, the spirit of the ninja is rekindled, blending tradition with modernity as competitors clash in the Ninjala Tournament, where strength, skill, and strategy are the keys to victory.
